languages.text: "Обыщите каждый закуток и вынесите все ценное — на станции должно быть полно тайников с добром".
languages.translation_comment: даем награду в виде экипировки/пушек + уникальный двигатель на корабль
даем награду в виде экипировки/пушек + уникальный двигатель на корабль

languages.text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
languages.original_text: "Обыщите каждый закуток и вынесите все ценное — на станции должно быть полно тайников с добром".

traits.locale_text: "Search every nook and cranny and take out anything of value. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
"Search every nook and cranny and take out anything of value. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
"Search every nook and cranny and take out anything of value. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
"Search every nook and cranny and take out anything of value. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
"Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
"Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

languages.text: "Sucht in jedem Winkel nach Dingen von Wert und bringt sie an Bord. Die Station müsste über überquellende Lager verfügen."
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

traits.locale_text: "Sucht in jedem Winkel nach Dingen von Wert und bringt sie an Bord. Die Station müsste über überquellende Lager verfügen."

languages.text: « Fouillez les lieux de fond en comble et rapportez tout ce que vous y trouverez d'intéressant. La station doit être pleine de caches truffées de butin. »
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

traits.locale_text: « Fouillez les lieux de fond en comble et rapportez tout ce que vous y trouverez d'intéressant. La station doit être pleine de caches truffées de butin. »

languages.text: «Registren hasta el último rincón en busca de cualquier objeto de valor y tráiganlo de vuelta. La estación debería estar repleta de botín».
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

traits.locale_text: «Registren hasta el último rincón en busca de cualquier objeto de valor y tráiganlo de vuelta. La estación debería estar repleta de botín».

languages.text: 「価値があるものがないか、隅々まで探して持ち帰るように。ステーションには略奪品が詰め込まれた隠し場所がいくつもあるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

traits.locale_text: 「価値があるものがないか、隅々まで探して持ち帰るように。ステーションには略奪品が詰め込まれた隠し場所がいくつもあるはずだ」

languages.text: “把每个角落都搜刮一遍，把所有有价值的东西都带回来。这座星站上应该到处都是战利品才对。”
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."

traits.locale_text: “把每个角落都搜刮一遍，把所有有价值的东西都带回来。这座星站上应该到处都是战利品才对。”

languages.text: "Kıymetli bir şey olmasına karşın tüm kuytu köşeleri arayın ve bulduklarınızı getirin. İstasyonun yağma zulalarıyla dolu olması gerek."
languages.original_text: "Search every nook and cranny for anything of value and bring it back. The station should be full of caches packed with plunder."
